creditline: Gift of Jack A. and Aviva Robinson
description: Wrapped and knotted lattice treatment on pieced fringe with warp-twined (tablet) heading, Pieced, printed lining. Black wool ground fabric with polychrome silk embroidery. The knotted fringe is silk. A printed cotton backing is attached to three sides by machine stitching and handsewn on the other. Center square with three borders. Top border not embroidered. Hand stitched to lining. Chain Stitch.
title: Ilgich
